reviews.review: Eu sinceramente achei o jogo bem viciante e gosto de passar meu tempo jogando ele. Eu gostaria de que tivesse outro planeta pra zerar, tipo Júpiter, Saturno, Urano, Netuno, Mercúrio, Vênus ou até mesmo o Sol (Que no caso seria o último planeta que poderia ser adquirido com apenas um traje que pudesse ser adquirido em algum último planeta. Tirando isso, eu gostei muito do jogo e queria que adicionassem mais coisas

yeah i think i like it idk. It all started in 2012 when my sister was born. You see she was the golden child no more Er3kt in the family, i had no one no one i tell you. Until i found her, she was amazing the kind of gal you get once in a life time. The kind of person the lights up your whole world with a barrel of gasoline. She was the one and i knew it, but, i had to make her know it. This is were things get tricky you see shes not the type to just waltz on into your life, no, i was going to have to work for this one. This is where my sister comes in your see farm girl has a thing for babies the cute kind and ohhh boy did i have one. So here we are at the day of reckoning i show her the baby and she melts just as planned but she wants more. I was dumbfounded what more could anyone possibly want. Thats when it came to me CS:GO was how i would win her heart. I fired up the olll counter strike showed her my one taps then she said it what i was waiting for. "lol who the fuck is gold nova still im LE scrub get a life im outta here"

There is so much you can do with this game, from play styles in comp to flying through the air surfing on a server. This has been my favorite game for so long and I hope that it continues to thrive and be enjoyable for everyone!

Este juego es una mierda. te toca un pavo que te mata de un tiro y no sabes de donde mierda ha venido el tiro. pero vaya, que le he dado más horas a esto que a polvos. la verdad que que puto asco, pero bueno la vida es lo que tiene. unos se reproducen y yo muero en el juego este de mierda. Lo recomiendo porque engancha mucho. puto asco de juego loco
